live_updates: Services have been stabilized and the issue is now resolved. We thank you for your patience during the interruption.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter. Thank you for your patience.
We're looking into it. Stay tuned for updates.
30533.summary: Some customers in the Riverview Lands & Riverview Park areas of Coquitlam are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
30533.title: Dec 15 – Coquitlam (Riverview Lands & Riverview Park) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
